blocks.name: df-eigvec
blocks.content: Define the eigenvector function. Theorem ~ eleigveccl shows that ` eigvec `` T ` , the set of eigenvectors of Hilbert space operator ` T ` , are Hilbert space vectors. (Contributed by NM, 11-Mar-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-eigval
blocks.content: Define the eigenvalue function. The range of ` eigval `` T ` is the set of eigenvalues of Hilbert space operator ` T ` . Theorem ~ eigvalcl shows that ` ( eigval `` T ) `` A ` , the eigenvalue associated with eigenvector ` A ` , is a complex number. (Contributed by NM, 11-Mar-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
